content.prompt: Which of the following statements best represents the thesis of the passage?

choices.label: Effective writing relies on grammar and vocabulary, not fancy technology.
The most compelling stories come from observation, not inspiration.
True writers understand that writing is a form of play, not work.
The key to success as a writer is consistent effort, not inherent ability.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
